p: The traditional treatment is pegylated interferon with ribavirin [ 7]. The duration of treatment is determined by the virologic response, which in turn is associated with the person’s genotype. With pegylated interferon and ribavirin therapy, a 24-week treatment course is recommended for genotypes 2 and 3 and a 48-week treatment course for other genotypes [ 7]. Persons with genotypes 2 and 3 who followed this regimen have ≥80 % SVR rate compared with a 40–50 % SVR rate for persons with genotype 1 [ 7].
